name: Going Viral!
description:
Take control of a virus that is attempting to compromise a human body! Defend yourself against blood cells that are trying to prevent you from compromising the immune system! 

Developer Notes/Post Mortem:

This week I felt like I improved quite a bit from my last game jam I did. I was able to properly scale all of my UI correctly, and managed to fit in a "info" section. Unfortunately, my artist was unable to help me draw anything, so all art in-game was far more simple, with little to no animation. I borrowed the background texture from wildtextures.com, and modified it to my needs.
